page.title: 15Flower Festivals
page.content: This year at St.Peters Church,there was a Flower Festival.The last one was held 15 years ago.Mrs.Wain organised it but everyone put there fair share of work i}n.There were beautiful arrangements of flowers in the church,and it looked lovely.There were concerts and services in which St.Peters Church choir took part in (I was in it)we sang anthems and hymns on Saturday 29th June and Sunday 30th June.The Howard School also took part in the service telling the story of St.Peter in words and music. The school did some maypole dancing and after each service or concert,there was scones,biscuits,coffee and orange squashsh in a marquee.There was also a plant stall and a cake stall.The 2000 pounds made went to St.Giles Hospice in Whittinton.
